header.about.title: Saikoucha
content.about.paragraph.first: Based in Indonesia and connected to various cities in Japan, we're a team dedicated to sharing the true essence of Japanese matcha with the world. Our mission is simple; providing premium and authentic matcha to be accessible and understood by everyone.
content.about.paragraph.second: As global demand rises, we work directly with Japanese farmers and trusted partners to offer high-quality matcha at a fair price. More than just a supplier, we aim to educate, support, and build a community that values reliability and cultural connection.
content.about.paragraph.third: Whether you're discovering matcha or searching for a reliable partner, we're here to guide you every step of the way!
